name: Pong Wars (West Essex Games)
description:
Humankind has long resolved its differences with war, and this continues now in Pong Wars! It's up to you to defeat the Cooltones by winning every table, thus putting and end to their Pong-War ambitions!

Use your blaster to smash the enemy's shield and temporarily stun them as you attempt to score.

Eight opponents to defeat.

Power-Ups.

Two-player, also.
